head.supplied: 7/8/69 ¶ ¶ The 6th volume of the fragmenta, dear Mr Tulk, has appeared. So if you send to Mr Ferres, I believe that Gentleman will be able to let you soon have a copy for your shelves. ¶ With best re...

div.p: VPRS 5831/PO/2, p. 221 miscellaneous inward correspondence, VA 912 Trustees of the Public Library, Museums and National Gallery, Public Record Office, Victoria.
The 6th volume of the fragmenta, dear Mr Tulk, has appeared. So if you send to Mr Ferres, I believe that Gentleman will be able to let you soon have a copy for your shelves.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: A good deal is done for the 7th vol.
